KEY RATING DRIVERS Net proceeds from the issuance are expected to be used to redeem $564 million of its Junior Subordinated Debentures due 2067. content: Uber Technologies Inc [UBER.UL] will use Progressive Insurance to provide coverage for drivers in Texas beginning on Friday  in a pilot that could lead the ride-hailing market leader to diversify its U.S. insurance purchasing from its current sole provider  Uber and Progressive executives told Reuters.
name: Progressive Corporation (The)
title: Exclusive: Uber will use Progressive Insurance to cover Texas drivers

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  January 21 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings expects to assign an 'A' rating to  Progressive Corporation's (NYSE: PGR) $400 million issuance of senior unsecured  notes maturing in 2045. The new notes' rating is equivalent to the ratings on  PGR's existing senior debt. name: Progressive Corporation (The)
